page.title: 16INDUSTRY
page.content:
The Maltings is where grain is washed and dried.It is part of{JOHN {SMITHS BREWERY.}The machines they used were kilns to dry and big drums to wash the grain. When it is ready, the grain is sent to the main brewery in Tadcaster.
{Roger Myerscough (Re-upholsterer) Mr Myerscough owns an upholstering factory. He mostly does the work for {pubs and restaurants,}but also settees and chairs for home use.The factory is quite small and most of the room is used as {storage for furniture and {materials,}some ready for delivering and some ready to be re upholstered.
